name: I need sleep
description:
This game is a work in progress, I have started out with a simple block to block action lol, and the end is a blue block. It gives you a jump boost! Have Fun!!!!

Jump over the enemy's so you don't die and have to restart the entire game!!!

THIS IS NOT A VIRUS!!!! Anti-virus software always says that this is a virus but it is not I swear

NEWLY ADDED!!!!

Enemy blocks!, Restart, AND FULL SCREEN!!!!!

Controls

Exit the game= Esc

Restart= R

Full screen= f4

Left = A

Right = D

Jump = W

A lot of coding has gone into this so please pay what you can to help me support the creation of this and many more games!

If you think you have a good idea feel free to post it in the comments I check them daily.

I know that the death system is insanely unfair, But I am working on a really nice checkpoint system so you don't have to restart the entire game.

This game is now in Official development i plan on releasing on steam on 10/12/15 9:00 a.m. so yay!

Please comment any bugs you happen to find along your journey

OTHER NEWS:

Starting a new forum where you can read and hear first about the development of this game and others!

I want to reach out to fellow game dev's and chat

We need to reach $149! So that my game development can outreach (what i didn't think would ever happen for me but seems to be coming true) Mac os x

And "I need sleep" is on track for 10 major updates! I dont see this game reaching to much as it is a jumping platformer lol
